src.visualization.image module

src.visualization.image.interpcolor(v, vminmax, cmap, rgb_only=True)[source]

convert number or array to RGB color

Parameters

  • v (number or ndarray with dimention 1, 2 or 3) – value to be converted to RGB color

  • vminmax (tuple) – (vmin,vmax) to normalize v

  • cmap (str or matplotlib.colors.Colormap) – colormap

Returns

rgb255 – converted value

Return type

same shape as v, dtype=np.uint8
